ai_opportunities.reason: High-risk workflow (financial/checkout) requires human ownership; only draft assistance allowed.

bottlenecks.flagged_reason: Repeated handoffs increasing cycle time; Single stage exceeding 2 days

recommendations.title: Limit handoffs
recommendations.detail: Tasks with repeated handoffs are delaying cycle time. Cap handoffs to 1 and keep ownership stable until QA.

recommendations.title: Break down long stages
recommendations.detail: Split work into smaller steps with intermediate check-ins every 24-36 hours to prevent stalls.

recommendations.title: Add AI copilots
recommendations.detail: Use AI to draft briefs, summaries, and outlines; enforce human review before sending externally.
